added.title: Sacred Traces
added.instruction: Research the history of a religious symbol.
added.info: Delve into the cultural and historical significance of a religious symbol by researching its origins and evolution. This expands your understanding of different belief systems, the power of symbolism, and the ways in which religious iconography has shaped societies and cultures throughout history.

added.title: Divinely Decoded
added.instruction: Study a weird interpretation of a sacred text.
added.info: Explore the diverse and sometimes unconventional ways in which sacred texts have been interpreted by examining a "weird" or unusual interpretation. This can challenge your assumptions, broaden your understanding of religious thought, and provide insights into the multifaceted nature of faith and interpretation.

added.title: Crust Issues
added.info: Embark on a rewarding culinary adventure by baking a pie from scratch. This allows you to master the art of pastry making, experiment with different fillings, and enjoy the satisfaction of creating a delicious and comforting dessert from raw ingredients.

added.title: Crunchy Delight
added.info: Explore the world of West African cuisine by making chin chin, a popular fried snack. This introduces you to new flavors and cooking techniques, providing a delicious and crunchy treat that can be enjoyed on its own or shared with others.

added.title: Taste of Nostalgia
added.instruction: Recreate a dish from your childhood.
added.info: Reconnect with your past and evoke cherished memories by recreating a favorite dish from your childhood. This allows you to revisit familiar flavors, potentially rediscover forgotten culinary traditions, and share a taste of your personal history with others.

added.title: Seasoned Explorer
added.instruction: Try a new herb or spice.
added.info: Expand your culinary horizons and enhance your cooking by experimenting with a new herb or spice. This introduces your palate to different flavors, allows you to add new dimensions to your dishes, and potentially discover new favorite ingredients that elevate your culinary creations.

added.title: Dressing to Impress
added.info: Elevate your salad game and showcase your culinary creativity by creating a unique salad dressing. This allows you to experiment with different flavor combinations, tailor your dressing to specific salads, and impress your guests with a homemade touch that enhances the dining experience.

added.title: Tropic Tang
added.instruction: Buy and eat part of a pineapple.
added.info: Enjoy the sweet and tangy flavor of a pineapple by purchasing and eating a portion of this tropical fruit. This provides a healthy dose of vitamins and minerals, allows you to appreciate the unique texture and taste of pineapple, and offers a refreshing and flavorful snack.

added.title: Monument
added.instruction: Hold a plank for a minute.
added.info: Strengthen your core and test your endurance by holding a plank for one minute. This challenging exercise engages multiple muscle groups, improves stability and posture, and provides a sense of accomplishment as you push your physical limits.

added.title: Fifteen to the Floor
added.info: Build upper body strength and improve your fitness level by completing a set of 15 push-ups. This classic exercise engages your chest, shoulders, and triceps, providing an effective way to tone your muscles and enhance your overall physical condition.

added.title: Pump It Up
added.info: Motivate yourself and achieve your fitness goals by joining a fitness challenge. This provides structure, accountability, and a sense of community, encouraging you to stay active, push your limits, and experience the rewards of a consistent exercise routine.

added.title: Wave Form
added.info: Embrace the thrill of riding the waves by learning to surf. This challenging and rewarding activity connects you with the ocean, improves your balance and coordination, and provides an exhilarating way to experience the power and beauty of the natural world.

added.title: Switch Dilemma
added.info: Engage in ethical and philosophical reflection by exploring the trolley problem. This thought experiment challenges you to consider difficult moral choices, weigh the consequences of different actions, and examine your own values and principles in the context of a classic ethical dilemma.

added.title: Shackled Shadows
added.instruction: Summarize the allegory of the cave.
added.info: Deepen your understanding of philosophical concepts by summarizing Plato's allegory of the cave. This allows you to engage with a foundational text in Western philosophy, explore themes of knowledge, perception, and reality, and reflect on the nature of truth and enlightenment.

added.title: Bullets and Bravado
added.info: Immerse yourself in the adrenaline-pumping world of classic action cinema. This provides an entertaining escape, allows you to appreciate the artistry of action filmmaking, and potentially discover iconic characters and stories that have shaped the genre.

added.title: Capes
added.info: Explore themes of heroism, justice, and extraordinary abilities by watching a superhero movie. This can be a fun and inspiring experience, allowing you to engage with stories of courage, selflessness, and the triumph of good over evil, while also enjoying the spectacle of superhuman feats and special effects.

added.title: Essence
added.info: Delve into the philosophical and spiritual concept of the "soul" by researching its various interpretations across cultures and belief systems. This allows you to explore fundamental questions about human nature, consciousness, and the possibility of an existence beyond the physical body, enriching your understanding of diverse perspectives on life's big questions.

added.title: Irrationality
added.info: Expand your philosophical horizons by learning about absurdism. This existentialist philosophy explores the inherent conflict between humanity's search for meaning and the apparent meaninglessness of the universe, providing a unique perspective on the human condition and challenging conventional notions of purpose and rationality.

added.title: The Way Back
added.instruction: Research the history of the internet.
added.info: Embark on a journey through the evolution of the internet by researching its history. This allows you to understand the origins of this transformative technology, appreciate the innovations that have shaped its development, and gain insights into its profound impact on communication, information access, and modern society.

added.title: Beyond the Bookmark
added.instruction: Read a chapter of Nietzsche's works.
added.info: Challenge your intellect and engage with profound philosophical ideas by reading a chapter of Nietzsche's works. This introduces you to his influential concepts, such as the will to power and the Ãœbermensch, providing a stimulating intellectual exercise and potentially prompting you to question conventional morality and values.

added.title: Encore!
added.info: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of musical theatre by watching a recorded performance or film adaptation. This allows you to experience the power of storytelling through song and dance, appreciate the artistry of musical performance, and enjoy the emotional resonance of a well-crafted musical narrative.

added.title: The Abyss
added.info: Delve into the depths of existentialist philosophy by listening to a podcast on the subject. This provides an accessible way to explore complex ideas about freedom, responsibility, and the search for meaning in a seemingly meaningless world, potentially sparking introspection and a deeper understanding of your own existence.

added.title: The Thinker's Tale
added.info: Gain insights into the lives and minds of influential thinkers by reading the biography of a philosopher. This allows you to understand the personal experiences and intellectual journeys that shaped their ideas, providing context for their philosophical contributions and potentially inspiring you to explore their works further.

added.title: Short Takes
added.instruction: Watch and review a short film.
added.info: Discover the art of concise storytelling by watching and reviewing a short film. This exposes you to diverse filmmaking styles, allows you to appreciate the skill involved in conveying a narrative within a limited timeframe, and hones your ability to critically analyze and articulate your thoughts about cinematic works.

added.title: In IMAX and 3D
added.info: Unleash your creativity and explore the visual language of cinema by designing a movie poster. This involves capturing the essence of a film through imagery, typography, and composition, providing a fun and engaging exercise in graphic design and visual communication.

added.title: Cut!
added.info: Pay homage to your favorite films and explore the art of filmmaking by recreating a movie scene. This allows you to delve into the details of cinematography, acting, and directing, providing a hands-on experience that deepens your appreciation for the craft of cinema while also being a fun and creative activity to do with friends.

added.title: Chapter Two
added.instruction: Watch a film adaptation of a book
added.info: Explore the relationship between literature and cinema by watching a film adaptation of a book you've read. This allows you to compare and contrast the two mediums, analyze how the story has been translated to the screen, and potentially gain new insights into the original narrative through its cinematic interpretation.

added.title: The Ode Place
added.info: Expand your literary horizons and gain insights into diverse cultural perspectives by reading a poem from a different culture. This exposes you to new poetic forms, themes, and expressions, enriching your understanding of the human experience as reflected through the art of poetry.

added.title: Hooked from the Start
added.info: Discover what makes a book captivating by reading the first chapter of a bestseller. This allows you to analyze the author's techniques for engaging readers from the outset, providing insights into effective storytelling strategies and potentially inspiring you to explore the rest of the book.

added.title: Cosmogenesis
added.instruction: Invent a myth about the stars.
added.info: Unleash your creativity and tap into the ancient tradition of storytelling by inventing a myth about the stars. This allows you to explore imaginative explanations for celestial phenomena, create your own constellations and narratives, and connect with the human impulse to find meaning and wonder in the night sky.
